Package org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.geo

Enum Class DistanceUnit

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<DistanceUnit>
org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.geo.DistanceUnit
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<DistanceUnit>, Constable
public enum DistanceUnit extends Enum<DistanceUnit>
The DistanceUnit enumerates several units for measuring distances. These units provide methods for converting strings and methods to convert units among each others.The default unit used within this project is METERS which is defined by DEFAULT
